summary: PWA manifest and HTML meta/links were added and the app registers a service worker; mobile/touch CSS improvements were made. However, the diff does not show the required generated PWA icon image files being added under the specified public assets path.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the generated PWA icon assets into the project as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from the PWA manifest.
missing_requirements.reason: The manifest references icon paths under /assets/generated, but the diff summary does not show the corresponding PNG icon files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated (only manifest and sw.js were added).

hallucinated_features.description: Added and registered a service worker (sw.js) for caching/offline behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly requested manifest, icons, and HTML meta tags for installability, but did not request adding a service worker or caching strategy.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project tracking metadata in project_state.json describing the project as an Android app and adding AR-* feature requests.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request changes to project_state.json or adding internal tracking entries.
